definition: to go nonstop to/through (as in "through train")/nonstop
straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: This is my first journey by the through train to Guangzhou .
sentences.chinese: 這是我第一次乘直達車去廣州。

sentences.english: Shanghai provides direst flights to more than 60 cities in the world.
sentences.chinese: 上海的國際航班可直達全國上60多座都會。

sentences.english: Yes, but it's far away from here. You'd better take bus No. 69 to get there.
sentences.chinese: 是的，不過那兒離這有點遠，您可以乘69路車直達。

sentences.english: Direct access to the full glory of a new era.
sentences.chinese: 直達光輝燦爛的新紀元。

sentences.english: The story of online grocer FreshDirect is something of a chicken-or-egg riddle.
sentences.chinese: 網上食雜商新鮮直達的故事有點像雞與蛋的謎團。

sentences.english: Letterbox Direct said it had followed all the correct procedures.
sentences.chinese: “直達信箱”表示它遵循了所有的正規程序。

sentences.english: The decoration of the hotel is dignity and elegance.
sentences.chinese: 酒店裝修高貴典雅，有直達電梯到各樓層。

sentences.english: China is building a high-speed freight rail line all the way to Hamburg Germany.
sentences.chinese: 中國正在建設一條高速貨運鐵路線，直達德國漢堡。

sentences.english: P:No, there's no through bus there, I'm afraid.
sentences.chinese: 不行，我恐怕沒有公共汽車直達那。

sentences.english: This river-sea ship belongs to low-speed full form.
sentences.chinese: 該江海直達船屬於低速肥大船型。

sentences.english: Vessel sailed from loading port to yingkou port directly . without discharging any cargo on the voyage.
sentences.chinese: 船舶由裝貨港直達營口港，中途未卸貨。

sentences.english: How long will this express take to go to Shanghai？
sentences.chinese: 這列直達快車開到上海要多久？

sentences.english: Convenient traffic, the number of lines to direct traffic.
sentences.chinese: 交通便捷，多條交通線路可直達。

sentences.english: They have booked two tickets through to Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 他們訂購了兩張直達北京的車票。

sentences.english: If there is basement, 1 goods lift need to go to basement.
sentences.chinese: 如果有地下室，必須有一部貨梯直達地下室。

sentences.english: No direct liner are available, we shall transship the goods to ensure timely delivery.
sentences.chinese: 爲保證及時交貨，如果沒有直達班輪，我們將轉船。

definition: to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
travel time/expected time for a car journey
(to take) a turn for the better/to change planes
to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
to open up (windows for air, ideas for discussion, transportation routes etc)
to get on or into (a bus, train, car etc)
